So first of all, what I want to show today.
Is that what is the current stations as we see it?

So apparently we are involved in several other projects which are dealing with this type of new organizational forms, which are network organizations, so we know that there are several new movements in terms of how to organize differently because we are living in a network worth, so it's different perspective, different concept, different mindset.
Everything is different actually.
And now what's happened?
Of course, is that what we want to do?

This is why there are several network organizations.
This is why virtual guess organizations are appearing up and so on.

Abilities my competence is.
Can be complemented with some other competencies and some other abilities from some other partner in order to be again more flexible, more open and also more competitive.

So there are two different things.
One is connected and the other one is integrated also in the concept.

And the fourth thing, which is also is very important is what is going on is that there are edge in the agile organizational structures coming out 'cause we're living in the world, which is changing every minute, not every day, every minute.
So what we're talking right now is already old, So what we have to talk is something which is the future.
And if you look at the company right now, or the structures which are right now there.
This company should be something which is like give me some of rules and lots of freedom to be, you know, to be creative, to be innovative and to work.
As a as a independent entity in a global scope, so this is what is the status of the art right now this is what is going on around the world around the Europe and this is what we have to cope with.
So This is why several things are needed.

First of all, we need solutions to support this type of new mentality, which is inefficient models, new models, new business models in organizational models, new organizational structures, solutions and so on.
And of course, or something which is unnecessary background and also the pain in the ass.
We say usually it is a nice infrastructure solutions, So what should be there to support what we have in my mind in our mind?
And these solutions of course has to be cheap and affordable.
And of course these solutions have to be efficient.
So that means that anybody can.
Take anything from somewhere, put it in his computer, his laptop, his environment to work efficiently from now on.
Not it doesn't mean that you will do something which is building or buying something, which is a huge system like ASAP and then spend let's say two or three years just to adapt it to it.
So that's dangerous of course.
And in the new World and you thinking it is differently, so you have to grab something.
Usually when you look at the guys.
Working on the Internet, what they're doing is they grab something which is there on the web, adapted a little bit for their own purposes, and put it back.

To do.

First of all, what we ought to do is to build up this open source European system or to adapt this open source ERP system that will be efficient, cheap, affordable for any small SMS in the fields of tool making and industry.
